title: A hierarchical container of zero or more other organizations.

name.description: Unique name for the organization (used in determining the organization's 'slug' value)

root_organization_id.description: The ID of the root organization of the organization tree that this organization belongs to. Can be the same as the value of this organization's id attribute.

parent_organization_id.description: The ID of the immediate parent organization of this organization or null if this organization is a root organization.
